displayProperties.name: Ornaments and Armor Glows
displayProperties.description: Ornaments and armor glows used to alter the appearance of your gear. Once obtained, these items may be used and reused by any of your characters. Armor glows are usable only with Solstice armor sets.

displayProperties.description: Tess Everis is an accomplished broker of stylish and highly coveted items procured from the City and beyond.
